txt.en: In the Shadow of the Emyn-nu-Fuin
Defeated many Orc-kind in Eryn Lasgalen.
You have defeated many Orcs in Eryn Lasgalen and have assisted the Elves in their efforts to restore the forest.
'Despite my efforts to rout them after the War, Orcs hide yet in the vales of the Emyn-nu-Fuin.\n\n'We must defeat them and drive them from Eryn Lasgalen if the taint of Mirkwood is ever to heal.'
Orcs can be found scattered throughout Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nKing Thranduil has bade you defeat any Orc-kind you come across.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>
The Orcs who escaped the Battle Under the Trees now hide in the vicinity of the Emyn-nu-Fuin.
